title_description: Perfect for Bars, Pubs, and Restaurants
first_list_item-1: Our locker is designed for maximum convenience and ease of use.
first_list_item-2: With a simple and intuitive interface, all you need is a coin or token to safely store your device.
first_list_item-3: No apps, no accounts, no hassle: open the locker and you're done in seconds.
first_list_item-4: Equipped with fast-loading capabilities and manufactured with 22-gauge steel sheet, security key lock, and electrostatic paint.
first_list_item-5: This locker keeps your device safe and charges it quickly.
first_list_item-6: Whether you're on vacation or traveling, you can trust that your device is protected against theft and ready when you need it.
title__fabrica: We are manufacturers and we adapt to your needs.
third_description:
This compact phone charger locker is the perfect solution for small venues and tight spaces.
With 2–3 secure charging compartments, it allows customers to safely lock up their phones and power up while they relax or enjoy their time.
It's incredibly easy to use—just insert a coin, place your device inside, and it starts charging immediately.

Despite its small size, this locker is equipped with fast-charging cables for various devices and features solid metal construction for maximum security.
Whether it’s at a bar, café, or event venue, this mini CharPhone station keeps devices safe and fully charged—so users stay connected and stress-free.
product_overview: Metal storage with built-in chargers for all gadgets. Safe and easy charging for your customers.
calc__title: We can work hand in hand with our clients to facilitate their requirements.
calc_hint: Here you can calculate your locker price.
cookie: We use cookies to improve your experience. See our Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy
